metadata.title: CVE-2021-41184 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: jQuery-UI is the official jQuery user interface library. Prior to version1.13.0, accepting the value of the `of` option of the `.position()` utilfrom untrusted sources may execute untrusted code. The issue is fixed injQuery UI 1.13.0. Any string value passed to the `of` option is now treatedas a CSS selector. A workaround is to not accept the value of the `of`option from untrusted sources.

criterions.comment: jqueryui: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
